org.linqs.psl.model.formula

Interface Formula

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBranchFormula, Atom, Conjunction, Disjunction, GroundAtom, Implication, Negation, ObservedAtom, QueryAtom, RandomVariableAtom

    public interface Formula
    A logical formula composed of Atoms and logical operators.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Method Detail

      • getDNF

        Formula getDNF()
        Returns:
        a logically equivalent Formula in disjunctive normal form

      • getAtoms

        Set<Atom> getAtoms(Set<Atom> atoms)
        Returns:
        Atoms in the Formula

      • collectVariables

        VariableTypeMap collectVariables(VariableTypeMap varMap)
        Adds the Variables
        Parameters:
        varMap -
        Returns:
        the passed in VariableTypeMap filled with the variables this formula uses.

      • flatten

        Formula flatten()
        Collapses nested formulas of the same type and remove duplicates at the top level. Does not change the context object. Order is not guarenteed. Ex: (A ^ B) ^ !!C ^ (D v E) becomes A ^ B ^ C ^ (D v E). Note that most formulas will return an object of the same type (eg a Conjunction will always return a Conjunction). However, it is possible for some types (like Negation) the return a different type.
        Returns:
        the flattened Formula.
